labels.name: story
labels.value: Navigate to QA Jobs and verify lever pages

name: Happy path â€“ QA jobs detail & apply flow on Lever for all configured locations

statusDetails.message:
Failures in QA jobs flow for location: berlin
	[berlin] Detail commitment mismatch expected [FULL-TIME (REMOTE)] but found [Full-Time (Remote) /],
	[berlin] Apply page commitment mismatch expected [FULL-TIME (REMOTE)] but found [Full-Time (Remote) /]
statusDetails.trace:

steps.name: Open Lever QA jobs page: https://jobs.lever.co/insiderone?team=Quality%20Assurance
Verify we are on QA jobs page URL
Select Location: Istanbul, Turkiye
Get all job cards on QA jobs listing
Click Apply button on first job card
Get job title on detail page
Get location on detail page
Get department on detail page
Get workplace type on detail page
Get commitment on detail page (optional)
Check 'Apply for this job' button is visible
Click 'Apply for this job' on detail page
Get job title on apply page
Get location on apply page
Get department on apply page
Get workplace type on apply page
Get commitment on apply page
Open Lever QA jobs page: https://jobs.lever.co/insiderone?team=Quality%20Assurance
Verify we are on QA jobs page URL
Select Location: Berlin, Germany
Get all job cards on QA jobs listing
Click Apply button on first job card
Get job title on detail page
Get location on detail page
Get department on detail page
Get workplace type on detail page
Get commitment on detail page (optional)
Check 'Apply for this job' button is visible
Click 'Apply for this job' on detail page
Get job title on apply page
Get location on apply page
Get department on apply page
Get workplace type on apply page
Get commitment on apply page
